Warranty & Support

Price: $35.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:41 UTC – Details)


The holidays are here and ‘tis the season to decorate your home but string lights are a struggle. Hanging lights is really hard work and takes too much time. Untangling them from the box is a pain and going out in the cold high up on a ladder quickly makes your joyous ho-ho-hos turn into bah-humbugs. When one bulb breaks, you need to check them all! Worse yet, during the day, your home’s appearance is ruined by ugly wires everywhere. But not anymore! From the number one laser decorating brand in the world comes the brand-new Star Shower Ultra 9 Laser Light Show, now with an incredible NINE different beautiful decorative light patterns for you to choose from. Star Shower Ultra 9 is the ORIGINAL laser light system that immerses your entire home from top to bottom with a galaxy of THOUSANDS of spectacular red and green lights! And it’s so easy! Just plug it in and turn it on. Your home can transform from dull to dazzling with a magical three-dimensional light field of beautiful crisp bright lights. Better yet, with Star Shower, you can have lights way up high on your house where no string light could ever reach. Star Shower even works on shrubbery and trees – higher than you could ever reach – making your home and yard look more festive than ever! Star Shower Ultra 9 covers up to 3200 square feet. For spectacular results use two or more Star Shower Ultra 9 units!
New 2022 Star Shower Model: From the makers of the best-selling holiday lights projector comes the newest, most innovative way to shower your home indoors and outdoors with thousands of brilliant, shining electric lights to create a winter wonderland of color
Fast, Easy Holiday Decorations: Holiday decorating with string lights is a tangled mess and if one light blows, they all go out; ditch the old holiday decorations with Star Shower Ultra 9 light projector, the fastest, easiest way to project thousands of festive laser lights onto your house
9 Light Patterns: Don’t be stuck with the same holiday decorations for all 25 days of Christmas; Star Shower Ultra 9 has 9 different patterns of holiday lights, so you can pick a new Christmas lights pattern every week or choose your favorite to shower your home through the holidays
3 Color Combinations: The AS SEEN ON TV Star Shower Ultra 9 outdoor lights and indoor lights projector features three different light combinations; choose from red and green lights together, only red, or only green and change color combinations with the press of a button
Still, Motion, or Blinking Laser Lights: Customize your laser light show with still, motion or blinking lights; Try the motion lights setting to enjoy a cascading, moving lights show dancing across your house, or use static mode and fall in love with the magical galaxy of still stars

4

(as of Nov 29,2022 10:05:41 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Take Control of Your Workspace and Always Find What You Need with these collapsible parts trays!

Perfect for most any use the Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4″ x 4″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized.

This 3-Piece Parts Tray Set delivers both quality plus savings that you wouldn’t get from other Tool Organizers and Magnetic Screw Trays.

WHY YOU NEED THIS TOOL:

3 Piece Collapsible Parts Trays – Blue, Red & GreenEasy to Expand and CollapseStrong Non-Marring Magnet that Holds to Almost Any Metal SurfaceEasy to Clean High-Grade Silicone ConstructionTray Dimensions Measure 4.25″ x 4.25″Expands to 2″ Tall. ¾” When CollapsedStores Your Small Tools and Items with Ease

A Versatile & Useful Tool for Any Professional or Hobbyist!

COLLAPSIBLE MAGNETIC PARTS TRAYS: The Sandor Magnetic Parts Trays each measure 4.25″ x 4.25″ with a strong rubber-covered non-marring magnet to protect surfaces from scratches. Perfect for holding screws, bolts, nuts, washers, small metal tools and parts to help keep you work area neat, clean, and organized
3 COLORS – SAE | METRIC | TORX: Save space and neatly organize your workspace. Every order of Sandor Collapsible Parts Trays includes 1 blue, 1 red, and 1 green parts tray so that you can easily color code nuts, bolts, tools, sockets, wrenches and more. Now you will always be able to find what you need just when you need it!
EASY TO USE. EASY TO CLEAN: Easily expands to 2” and collapses down to only ¾”. The silicone design can be easily cleaned with soap and water. Strong magnetic base holds to most metal surfaces. Perfect for hobbyists, automotive, mechanics, engineers, plumbers, carpenters, machinists, HVAC & more
REAL TOOLS. REAL QUALITY: Our automotive and machinist hand tools are tough-as-nails. Made of high-grade silicone to ensure high strength, hardness, wear, and resistance for durability. The low-profile design allows for compact and easy storage
TRUSTED BRAND! WE STAND BY OUR PRODUCTS: When others talk quality, we deliver it. That’s why we always offer a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. At SANDOR Tool we only use the highest quality materials in our products, and we go the extra mile to stand by our tools. Your satisfaction is our priority. It’s that simple

(as of Nov 29,2022 02:17:57 UTC – Details)


Klein Tools’ Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set includes an insulated handle and 5 interchangeable insulated blades for quick changes on the job. The auto-eject mechanism works with just a twist, allowing you to change or flip blades simply and easily. A bright orange coating of insulation protects from electrical shock, as well as being flame and impact resistant. Klein insulated tools exceed the ASTM F1505 standards for insulated tools, and are clearly marked with the official 1000-volt rating symbol. The set of five Phillips, Square and Slotted slim-tip blades come in a protective roll pouch, making this the perfect set for your tool bag.
Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set with an insulated handle, 5 interchangeable insulated blades, and a carrying pouch
Screwdriver Set includes tip sizes: two #2 Phillips, two 1/4-Inch Slotted, one #1 Phillips, one #1 Square, one #2 Square, and one 3/16-Inch Slotted
Securely and easily release the blade with a quick twist of the lock collar
Interchangeable blades with a slim-tip to fit tight terminal blocks
Handle and blade have a 1000-Volt insulation rating and meets or exceeds ASTM F1505 standard for insulation
A layer of orange impact and flame resistant insulation protects from electric shock
Cushion-Grip handles for greater torque and comfort

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Insulated Screwdriver, 8-in-1 Screwdriver Set with Interchangeable Blades, 3 Phillips, 3 Slotted and 2 Square Tips

Klein Tools’ Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set includes an insulated handle and 5 interchangeable insulated blades for quick changes on the job. The auto-eject mechanism works with just a twist, allowing you to change or flip blades simply and easily. A bright orange coating of insulation protects from electrical shock, as well as being flame and impact resistant.

  • Interchangeable Insulated Screwdriver Set with an insulated handle, 5 interchangeable insulated blades, and a carrying pouch
  • Includes tip sizes: two #2 Phillips, two 1/4-Inch Slotted, one #1 Phillips, one #1 Square, one #2 Square, and one 3/16-Inch Slotted
  • Securely and easily release the blade with a quick twist of the lock collar
  • Interchangeable blades with a slim-tip to fit tight terminal blocks
  • Handle and blade have a 1000-Volt insulation rating and meets or exceeds F1505 standard for insulation
  • A layer of orange impact and flame resistant insulation protects from electric shock
  • Cushion-Grip handles for greater torque and comfort
  • Double-ended blades have a 3.5-Inch shaft length, single-ended blades have 5.75-Inch shaft length

Read more

FEATURES

Change or flip blade easily with just a twist of the lock collar

Screwdriver has 1000-Volt insulation rating for handle and blade

Screwdriver Set with durable roll pouch for protective storage

Read more
